headline: Apache Corporation Tree Grant Program Announces 2025 Recipients
summary: This season marks the 20th anniversary of the Apache Tree Grant ProgramHOUSTON, Aug. 28, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Apache Corporation, a subsidiary of APA Corporation (Nasdaq: APA), today announced the donation of more than 16,000 trees to nonprofit partner organizations and government agencies through the annual U.S. Apache Tree Grant Program. The program is a highly impactful stewardship initiative that aims to give back to the communities in which the company operates. Since the program’s inau
